sentences.english: If you serve like Jesus, you can expect to be criticized.
sentences.chinese: 假若你像耶穌那樣地服事，必然會受到批評。

sentences.english: But if one can tear out completely the root of the thing ?
sentences.chinese: 但是假若人能徹底拔掉它的根部呢？

sentences.english: Had dI the heavens' embroidered cloths, inwrought with golden and silver light.
sentences.chinese: 假若我有天神的繡袍，鑲嵌着金光和銀光。

sentences.english: And if so, by whom is it so empowered?
sentences.chinese: 假若有，是誰受權他們這樣做？

sentences.english: If I speak in the tongues of men and of angles.
sentences.chinese: 假若我能說萬人的方言，並天使的話。

sentences.english: As always, if we over-compensated, we'll adjust the numbers again. But as I said, our initial round of nerfs wasn't sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 經常，假若我們偏激了，我們會再一次更動這些數字。

sentences.english: Should it be necessary, I would go.
Youll succeed in time if you keep on working hard.
sentences.chinese: 假若堅持努力下去，你遲早會成功的。

sentences.english: In this case, the magnetic field is probably generated by swirling plasma.
sentences.chinese: 假若這樣，磁場可能是由旋動的等離子產生的。

sentences.english: If I were you; I would not be worried by English.
sentences.chinese: 假若我是你，就不會爲英語煩懣了。

sentences.english: It would be nice if someone in Washington actually cared.
sentences.chinese: 假若華盛頓真的有人關心此事那就好了。

sentences.english: If you wish to know how to get hsoftwareiness you must pay care concerning the following two points.
sentences.chinese: 假若你希望大白如何獲得怡悅，你須當心下面兩點。

sentences.english: Try to start early, if possible.
sentences.chinese: 假若可能的話，儘量早點啓碇。

sentences.english: My name is Johnny. If you need any help at all, do let me know.
sentences.chinese: 我叫莊尼，假若你們有任何需要，請告訴我。

sentences.english: If you enter this compexclusivey- whnext to section would you like to work in?
sentences.chinese: 假若能進公司，你想在哪個部門事業？

definition: so much so that/to the extent that/even
to be bound to/to be sure to
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
